General.Name: Resintech Bhd
General.Description: Resintech Berhad, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, trades, and markets plastic pipes, water tanks, and fittings in Malaysia, Indonesia, Cambodia, Singapore, and internationally. It offers polyethylene, polypropylene, acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrene pipes, tanks, and fittings; and HDPE corrugated pipes and fittings for sewerage discharge application, drainage and irrigation, underground power cable, and telecommunication cable protector. The company also provides HDPE pipes for municipal water pipelines; septic tanks; domestic water tanks for household use; UPVC pipes which are used to discharge the unwanted water and sewerage from house; PVC rain gutters for draining excess rainwater from house; road safety barriers; rainwater harvesting tanks for storing the rainwater from the roof top; and fittings for various types of joints for plastics pipes. In addition, it engages in property holding activities; and trading and marketing of children's playground equipment. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Telok Panglima Garang, Malaysia.
